mainTitle: Dubai is a world of experiences
metaDescription: Dubai is a business hub and economic centre of the Middle East. Its glory partially built on its oil revenue, it allowed the construction of unique architectural sites, such as the tallest building in the world. The city is modern and rich and it will give you a taste of luxury, while experiencing traditional Middle Eastern hospitality.
metaTitle: Do not miss your chance to visit Dubai
name: Dubai
